meanings.definition: The process of bubbling or fizzing as gas escapes
meanings.sent1: The effervescences in the soda were so fun to watch!
meanings.sent2: The effervescences of the champagne were a sign of its freshness.
meanings.sent3: The effervescences in the science experiment made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The effervescences of laughter bubbled up from the group of friends.
meanings.sent5: The effervescences of the boiling water were like tiny dancing bubbles.

meanings.definition: The state of being lively or enthusiastic
meanings.sent1: Her effervescences at the party were contagious.
meanings.sent2: The effervescences of the children playing in the park were delightful.
meanings.sent3: His effervescences about the new movie were truly infectious.
meanings.sent4: The effervescences of the crowd at the concert filled the air with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The effervescences of joy in her heart were evident in her bright smile.
